product_name: REI Quarter Dome T2 Plus Tent - Special Buy
long_description: The freestanding REI Quarter Dome T2 Plus tent uses lightweight materials and a unique pole design to create a spacious, durable 3-season backpacking tent for a pair of adventurers.
short_description: The freestanding REI Quarter Dome T2 Plus tent uses lightweight materials and a unique pole design to create a spacious, durable 3-season backpacking tent for a pair of adventurers.
